concept-wr.title: VNF Integration at Launch Time
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can use one or more mechanisms to pass information to a new VNF when it is originally launched. The VNF can use this information for system configuration purposes or to determine running options for the services it provides.

conbody.p: The mechanisms used to convey information from the Cloud OS to the VNF are the metadata server and config drive.

li.p: user data is made available to the VNF through either the metadata service or the config drive
cloud-init reads information from either the metadata server or the config drive

conbody.p: Detailed information about the OpenStack metadata server, config drive, and cloud-init is available online.
